name: Emailing Capability
description: Complete emailing capability with sending, templates, lists, subscribers, and analytics

hooks.useSendEmail: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; messageId?: string }, Error, { to: string | string[]; subject: string; body: string; from?: string; html?: string; text?: string }>
hooks.useCreateTemplate: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; templateId: string }, Error, { name: string; subject: string; html: string; text?: string }>
hooks.useUpdateTemplate: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { templateId: string; name?: string; subject?: string; html?: string; text?: string }>
hooks.useDeleteTemplate: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { templateId: string }>
hooks.useSubscribe: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { email: string; listId?: string }>
hooks.useUnsubscribe: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { email: string; listId?: string }>
hooks.useTemplates: UseQueryResult<Array<{ id: string; name: string; subject: string; createdAt: string }>, Error>
hooks.useTemplate: UseQueryResult<{ id: string; name: string; subject: string; html: string; text?: string; createdAt: string }, Error>
hooks.useEmails: UseQueryResult<Array<{ id: string; recipient: string; subject: string; status: 'sent' | 'failed'; sentAt: string }>, Error>
hooks.useEmailAnalytics: UseQueryResult<{ sent: number; delivered: number; opened: number; clicked: number; failed: number }, Error>
